content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mine at position(16.0, 71.0)
Consists of 
- Burner Mining Drill at position(16.0, 71.0)
- Wooden Chest at position(16.5, 72.5)
- Burner Inserter at position(17.5, 72.5) and Burner Inserter at position(17.5, 71.5)
- Stone Furnace at position(17.0, 74.0)

### ERROR TIPS

* Errors when using undefined variables
  - Ensure that variables are defined before using them. 
  - Check the scope of the variable and make sure it is accessible where it is being used.
* Errors when inserting items into entities
  - Make sure the item to be inserted is available in the inventory.
  - Check the type of item and the entity's capacity to accept that item.
* Errors when connecting entities with transport belts
  - Ensure that the source entity is capable of outputting items directly or indirectly to the transport belt.
  - Use an inserter as a source entity when connecting to a transport belt, especially when the source is a chest.
  - Check that the drop position of the source inserter is not occupied by another entity.
* Errors when placing entities
  - Ensure that the position where you are trying to place an entity is not occupied by another entity.
  - Consider increasing the spacing, changing the direction, or changing the reference position when placing entities.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
